byline.contributor: Chris Buckley contributed reporting from Beijing. Mia Li contributed research from Beijing.

abstract: Pres Xi Jinping of China and Taiwanese Pres Ma Ying-jeou make history by meeting for first time; many see diplomatic session in Singapore as breakthrough gesture by both nations toward peace after decades of bitter rivalry.
lead_paragraph: The meeting in Singapore between Xi Jinping and Ma Ying-jeou comes amid increasing wariness among Taiwan voters of Beijing’s embrace.

headline.main: Leaders of China and Taiwan Talk of Peace Across the Strait
headline.print_headline: Leaders of China and Taiwan Talk of Peace Across the Strait

snippet: The meeting in Singapore between Xi Jinping and Ma Ying-jeou comes amid increasing wariness among Taiwan voters of Beijing’s embrace.
